register.description: This register logs the different reset sources of the PERIPHERAL domain. Each bit is set upon release of the domain reset signal. Must be cleared by software.

bitfield.description: Write 0s for future compatibility. Read returns 0.
CORE domain wake-up reset

bitenum.description: PER domain has been reset following a CORE power domain wake-up from OFF to ON.

bitfield.description: Power domain wake-up reset

bitenum.description: PER domain has been reset following a PERIPHERAL power domain wake-up.

bitfield.description: Global warm reset

bitenum.description: PER domain has been reset upon a global warm reset

bitfield.description: Global cold reset

bitenum.description: PER domain has been reset upon a global cold reset

register.description: This register allows enabling/disabling modules wake-up events.

bitfield.description: Write 0s for future compatibility. Read returns 0.
UART 4 wake-up control
GPIO 6 wake-up control
GPIO 5 wake-up control
GPIO 4 wake-up control
GPIO 3 wake-up control
GPIO 2 wake-up control
Write 0s for future compatibility. Read returns 0.
UART 3 wake-up control
GPTIMER 9 wake-up control
GPTIMER 8 wake-up control
GPTIMER 7 wake-up control
GPTIMER 6 wake-up control
GPTIMER 5 wake-up control
GPTIMER 4 wake-up control
GPTIMER 3 wake-up control
GPTIMER 2 wake-up control
McBSP 4 wake-up control
McBSP3 wake-up control
McBSP 2 wake-up control

UART 4 is attached to the MPU wake-up events group.

register.description: This register logs module wake-up events. Must be cleared by software. If it is not cleared, it prevents further domain transition.

bitfield.description: Write 0s for future compatibility. Read returns 0.
UART 4 Wake-up status

bitenum.description: UART 4 wake-up did not occur or was masked.

bitfield.description: GPIO 6 Wake-up status

bitenum.description: GPIO 6 wake-up did not occur or was masked.

bitfield.description: GPIO 5 Wake-up status

bitenum.description: GPIO 5 wake-up did not occur or was masked.

bitfield.description: GPIO 4 Wake-up status

bitenum.description: GPIO 4 wake-up did not occur or was masked.

bitfield.description: GPIO 3 Wake-up status

bitenum.description: GPIO 3 wake-up did not occur or was masked.

bitfield.description: GPIO 2 Wake-up status

bitenum.description: GPIO 2 wake-up did not occur or was masked.

bitfield.description: Write 0s for future compatibility. Read returns 0.
UART 3 Wake-up status

bitenum.description: UART 3 wake-up did not occur or was masked.

bitfield.description: GPTIMER 9 Wake-up status

bitenum.description: GPTIMER 9 wake-up did not occur or was masked.

bitfield.description: GPTIMER 8 Wake-up status

bitenum.description: GPTIMER 8 wake-up did not occur or was masked.

bitfield.description: GPTIMER 7 Wake-up status

bitenum.description: GPTIMER 7 wake-up did not occur or was masked.

bitfield.description: GPTIMER 6 Wake-up status

bitenum.description: GPTIMER 6 wake-up did not occur or was masked.

bitfield.description: GPTIMER 5 Wake-up status

bitenum.description: GPTIMER 5 wake-up did not occur or was masked.

bitfield.description: GPTIMER 4 Wake-up status

bitenum.description: GPTIMER 4 wake-up did not occur or was masked.

bitfield.description: GPTIMER 3 Wake-up status

bitenum.description: GPTIMER 3 wake-up did not occur or was masked.

bitfield.description: GPTIMER 2 Wake-up status

bitenum.description: GPTIMER 2 wake-up did not occur or was masked.

bitfield.description: McBSP 4 Wake-up status

bitenum.description: McBSP 4 wake-up did not occur or was masked.

bitfield.description: McBSP3 Wake-up status

bitenum.description: McBSP 3 wake-up did not occur or was masked.

bitfield.description: McBSP 2 Wake-up status

bitenum.description: McBSP 2 wake-up did not occur or was masked.

register.description: This register allows enabling or disabling the wake-up of the PER domain upon another domain wakeup events.

bitfield.description: Write 0s for future compatibility. Read returns 0.
WAKEUP domain dependency

bitenum.description: PER domain is independent of WKUP domain wake-up event.
PER domain is woken-up upon WKUP domain wake-up event.

bitfield.description: Write 0s for future compatibility. Read returns 0.
IVA2 domain dependency

bitenum.description: PER domain is independent of IVA2 domain wake-up event.
PER domain is woken-up upon IVA2 domain wake-up event.

bitfield.description: MPU domain dependency

bitenum.description: PER domain is independent of MPU domain wake-up event.
PER domain is is woken-up upon MPU domain wake-up event.

bitfield.description: CORE domain dependency (CORE-L3 clock domain only, not CORE-L4)

bitenum.description: PER domain is independent of CORE domain wake-up event (CORE-L3 clock domain only, not CORE-L4).
PER domain is woken-up upon CORE domain wake-up event.

register.description: This register controls the PER domain power state transition.

bitfield.description: Write 0s for future compatibility. Read returns 0.
Memory state when ON

bitenum.description: Memory is always ON when domain is ON.

bitfield.description: Write 0s for future compatibility. Read returns 0.
Memory state when RETENTION

bitenum.description: Memory is always retained when domain is in RETENTION state.

bitfield.description: Write 0s for future compatibility. Read returns 0.
Logic state when domain is RETENTION

bitenum.description: Logic build with retention flip-flop (GPIO) is retained and remaining logic is OFF when domain is in RETENTION state.
Logic is retained when domain is in RETENTION state.

bitfield.description: Power state control

register.description: This register provides a status on the power state transition of the PERIPHERAL domain.

bitfield.description: Write 0s for future compatibility. Read returns 0.
Domain transition status

bitenum.description: PERIPHERAL power domain transition is in progress.

bitfield.description: Write 0s for future compatibility. Read returns 0.
Logic state status
Current power state status

register.description: This register provides a status on the PER domain previous power state. It indicates the state entered during the last sleep transition.

bitfield.description: Write 0s for future compatibility. Read returns 0.
Last logic state entered

bitenum.description: PER domain logic was previously OFF
PER domain logic was previously ON

bitfield.description: Last power state entered

bitenum.description: PER domain was previously in RETENTION
